name: Mine Headframes
description: Structures supporting mining operations provide access to valuable minerals and employment. The dangerous work creates health risks, while the valuable materials attract both honest workers and greedy speculators.
atmosphere: Tall steel towers support pulley systems that raise and lower miners and ore from deep shafts. Industrial machinery clatters constantly while dust clouds mark the extraction process. The air carries metallic minerals and industrial activity. Dangerous but profitable mining operations extract earth's treasures.
